newsitem.title: USA: Cotelligent sees Q4 EPS of $0.15 to $0.17.
newsitem.headline: Cotelligent sees Q4 EPS of $0.15 to $0.17.

text.p: Cotelligent Group Inc said that, on a pro forma basis, it expects earnings per share for the fourth quarter to be between $0.15 and $0.17.
It expects revenues in excess of $40 million for the quarter to March 31, compared with $28.2 million a year ago and $37.3 million in the quarter to December 31, 1996.
On a pro forma basis, it expects pre-tax profit in excess of $2.3 million for the quarter ended March 31, 1997 as compared with $1.8 million for the same period the prior year.
The company expects to announce definitive results for the fourth quarter and year-end during the last week in April.
